properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Lord, what love is this? That pays so dearly That I, the guilty one, may go free?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Amazing love, Oh what sacrifice! The Son of God giv’n for me; My debt He pays And my death He dies That I might live, That I might live.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And so, they watched Him die; despised, rejected But, oh the blood He shed, flowed for me!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Amazing love, Oh what sacrifice! The Son of God giv’n for me; My debt He pays And my death He dies That I might live, That I might live.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And now this love of Christ shall flow like rivers. Come wash your guilt away, live again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Amazing love, Oh what sacrifice! The Son of God giv’n for me; My debt He pays And my death He dies That I might live, That I might live.{/lang-eng}
